Socma Group is dedicated to leveraging t: Kooxda Socma waxay ka go'antahay inay adeegsato tiknoolajiyada si ay u horumariso waxtarka jawaabta degdega ah. Kooxdeenu waxay ka kooban yihiin xirfadlayaal khibrad leh oo ku takhasusay tiknoolajiyada, daryeelka caafimaadka, iyo qaybaha jawaabta degdega ah, oo ay ku xiran yihiin himilada ah badbaadinta nolosha iyo bixinta caawinta degdega ah ee xaaladaha adag.
The inspiration behind our emergency res: Dhiirrigelinta ka dambeysa barnaamijkeena jawaabta degdega ah waxay ka timaadaa baahida loo qabo in la fududeeyo oo la hagaajiyo sida adeegyada degdega ah loo diro loona maareeyo. Iyadoo la aqoonsanayo muhiimadda wakhtiga ee xaaladaha degdega ah, barnaamijkayagu wuxuu ujeedkiisu yahay inuu si weyn u yareeyo waqtiyada jawaabta wuxuuna hubinayaa in caawimaad had iyo jeer dhowr taabasho oo kaliya ay jiraan.
Rapid dispatch of emergency services\n-:
- Dirid degdeg ah oo adeegyada degdega ah
- Raadiyaha waqtiga-dhabta ah ee cutubyada jawaabta degdega ah
- Isgaarsiin toos ah oo lala yeesho kuwa jawaabaya
- Helitaanka macluumaadka caafimaadka muhiimka ah ee daaweynta hufan ee goobta
- Digniinaha bulshada iyo ogeysiisyada badbaadada
Drop, Cover, and Hold On. Move as little: Iska tuur, Daboosho, oo Qabso. U dhaqaaq sida ugu yar ee suurtogalka ah - inta badan dhaawacyada inta lagu jiro dhulgariirka waxay dhacaan sababtoo ah dadka oo dhaqaaqaya, ku socda dhalo, iyo dhaca.
Take cover under a sturdy piece of furni: Daboosho oo hoos u qari agab adag.
After the shaking stops, evacuate to a s: Marka gariirku joogsado, u guur meel amaan ah.
Check for injuries and provide first aid: Hubi dhaawacyada oo bixi gargaarka degdega ah haddii loo baahdo.
Stay updated on emergency alerts and fol: La soco digniinta degdega ah oo raac talooyinka maamulka.
Avoid flood waters and stay indoors. If: Ka fogow biyaha daadadka oo guriga joog. Haddii aad dibadda u baxdo, ka fogow socodka ama wadista biyaha daadadka, kuwaas oo laga yaabo inay koronto ka buuxaan xariiqyo koronto oo hoos udhacay ama dhulka hoostiisa.
Guriga joog haddii ay suurtogal tahay.
Ka fogow wadista goobaha daadadka ah.
If trapped in a flooded area, seek highe: Haddii aad ku xayirnaato meel daadad ah, raadi meel sare oo caawi u dalbo.
Listen to weather updates and evacuation: Dhageyso wararka cimilada iyo amarrada daadgureynta.
After the flood, avoid returning to your: Ka dib daadadka, ka fogow gurigaaga ilaa maamulka ay ku sheega inaad ku laaban karto amaan.
Prepare an emergency kit. Stay inside an: Diyaari qalabka gurmadka. Joog gudaha oo iska jir daaqadaha, godadka cirka iyo albaabada muraayadaha. Raadi meel ammaan ah oo gurigaaga ah (qolka gudaha, armaajo ama musqul oo ku taal heer hoose).
Prepare an emergency kit with essentials: Diyaari qalabka gurmadka oo leh waxyaabaha muhiimka ah sida biyaha, cuntada, daawooyinka, iyo dukumentiyada muhiimka ah.
Stay informed about the hurricane by mon: La soco wararka duufaanka adiga oo la soconaya wararka cimilada iyo digniinaha.
Board up windows and secure outdoor item: Daaqadaha isgeli oo alaabta dibadda ku xidhid.
Stay inside during the storm and away fr: Joog gudaha inta duufaanku socdo oo iska jir daaqadaha iyo albaabada.
After the storm, check for damage and av: Ka dib duufaanka, hubi dhaawaca oo iska jir xadhkaha korontada ee dhulka yaalla iyo meelaha fatahay.
Check responsiveness: Tap and shout to s: Hubi inu jawaabayo: Taabo oo qayli si aad u aragto haddii qofku ka jawaabayo. ugu wac caawimaad: Garaac adeegyada gurmadka. Wadada hawada: Fur wadada hawada qofka adigoo madaxa dib u celinaya oo daanka kor u qaadaya. Neefsashada: Hubi neefsashada; haddii uusan qofku neefsanayn,u bilow CPR. Hawo: Sii neef haddii aad tababaran tahay; haddii kale, sii wad cadaadiska oo kaliya.
Protect yourself: Wear gloves if possibl:
Is ilaalin: Xiro gacmo gashi haddii suurtagal ah. 
Cadaadis saar: Isticmaal maro nadiif ah ama faashad si aad cadaadis adag u saarto goobta dhiigbaxa. 
Kor u qaad: Haddii ay suurtagal tahay, kor u qaad qaybta dhiigbaxa o gaarsi heer ka sareeya wadnaha. 
Xiro faashad: Marka dhiigbax la xakameeyo, xiro marada adigoo isticmaalaya  faashad. 
La soco: Eeg calaamadaha naxdinta oo sii wad cadaadiska ilaa caawiyayaashu yimaadaan.

dhulka dhig qofka: Hoos Kuhay dhabarkiisa oo kor u qaad cagihiisa si yar, ilaa ay ka keento xanuun. 
Fududayn: Fududee dharka adag oo ku dabool buste si aad u ilaaliso heerkulka jidhka. 
Ha siin wax dareereah : Xitaa haddii qofku haraadsan yahay, iska ilaali inaad wax cabsiiso. 
Wac caawimaad: Si dhow ula soco xaaladooda ilaa kuwa gurmadka degdega ah yimaadaan.
Cool the burn: Run cool (not cold) water:
Qabooji qaybta gubatay: Ku shub biyo qabow qaybta gubatay dhowr daqiiqo ama ku dabool maro qabow ama qoyan. 
Dabool qaybta gubashada: Isticmaal faashad nadiif ah, aan dheg dheg lahayn ama maro nadiif ah.

ku Dhiirrigeli qofka inuu qufac0: Haddii qofku qufaci karo ama hadli karo,ku dhiirrigeli inay sii wadaan . 
Shan jeer dhabarka ka garaac: Haddii qufacu shaqayn waayo, shan jeer dhabarka ku dhufo inta u dhaxaysa garbaha qofka adigoo isticmaalaya qaybta hoore e gacantaada. 
Shan jeer caloosha ka  riix: Haddii dhabarka garaacistiisu shaqayn waydo, samee habka Heimlich. 
ku celi markale: Sii wad wareegyada dhabar garaacista iyo calool riixista ilaa shaygu ka baxo ama qofku ka jawaabi waayo.

Ka fogow dhaqdhaqaaqa: Xaddid dhaqaaqa oo isla markiiba raadi caawimaad caafimaad.
Keep the person still: Encourage them to:
Ka dhig qofka mid aan dhaqdhaqaaqin: Ku dhiirrigeli inay jiifaan iyagoo aan dhaqaajin madaxa. 
Xakamee dhiigbaxa: Maro mari si cadaadis jilicsan ah, adigoo iska ilaalinaya cadaadis toos ah nabar haddii aad ka shakisan tahay dillaaca .

Prevent injury: Clear the area around th:
Ka hortaga dhaawaca: Ka nadiifi qofka agtiisa waxyabaha qatarta ah si aad uga hortagto dhaawac.

Identify and remove the allergen: If kno:
OAqonso oo ka saar alerjiga: Haddii la yaqaan Alerjiga, si dhaqso ah uga saar alerjiga. 
La soco anaphylaxis: Eeg dhibaatada neefsashada, finanka, bararka, ama hoos u dhaca dhiigkarka. 
Mari epinephrine: Haddii qofku haysto aaladda epinephrine iyo haddii uu leeyahay falcelin daran, mari. 
Wac caawimaad degdeg ah: Had iyo jeer caawimaad caafimaad raadi isticmaalka ka dib aaladda epinephrine.
Identify the poison: Ask the person what: Aqoonso sunta: Weydii qofka waxa uu qaaday, inta uu qaaday, iyo goorta. Wac xarunta xakameynta sunta: La xiriir xarunta xakameynta sunta si aad u hesho talo gaar ah.
How do I register for the app?: Sideen appka iskaga diiwaan galin karaa?
To register, download the app and follow: Si aad iskaga  diiwaan geliso, soo deji appka oo raac tilmaamaha shaashadda si aad u abuurato account.
How do I report an emergency?: Sidee u sheegaa xaalad degdeg ah?
In the event of an emergency, open the a: Haddii ay dhacdo xaalad degdeg ah, fur appka, guji badhanka "report" oo raac tilmaamaha si aad u faahfaahiso xaaladda.
How can I update my personal information: Sideen u cusbooneysiin karaa macluumaadkeyga shakhsiyeed?
Go to the Settings section of the app, a: Tag qeybta Dejinta appka, waxaadna ka heli doontaa fursado aad ku cusbooneysiin karto macluumaadkaaga shakhsiyeed.
Your privacy is our priority. We use sta: Qarsoodigaaga waa mudnaantayada. Waxaan isticmaalnaa sir-faragelin casri ah waxaanan u hoggaansannaa xeerarka maxalliga ah si loo xaqiijiyo in xogtaadu ammaan tahay.
What are the typical response times?: Waa maxay waqtiyada jawaabta caadiga ah?
Response times can vary, but typically,: Waqtiyada jawaabtu way kala duwanaan karaan, laakiin caadi ahaan, mas'uuliyiinta deegaanka waxaa lagu wargeliyaa 1-2 daqiiqo gudahooda warbixintaada.
Our service is currently available in ma: Adeeggayagu hadda wuxuu ka jiraa magaalooyinka waaweyn ee dalka. Fiiri boggeena internetka liiska gobollada taageerada.
If the app crashes, try restarting your: Haddii barnaamijku burburo, isku day inaad dib u bilowdo qalabkaaga. Haddii dhibaatadu sii socoto, fadlan la xiriir kooxdayada taageerada.
